posts.post_content: I picked up some nice post cards this weekend---I have a 4 scan page--if anybody wants a closer scan, let me know---1908 Raymond Kahn Cleveland $500-(SOLD)--Sporting News (postmark  Peru)$225===1907 Dietsche William Donovan $$75---Wolverine George Mullin (nice inscription on Mullin) $200---I have 5 more for tomorrow-----thanks,  Don---I added extra scans per requests.========Kahn Clevland sold
